text.Dervahl: I think I've got it working. There. Now say something, both of you doves.

text.Woman's Voice: I don't know. What do you want me to say?

text.Dervahl: Whatever you want. I just want to hear your voice... and keep it for later.

text.Girl's Voice: I'll sing, papa! La la la la la la la...

text.Dervahl: There. A song and a laugh. Even better than words, and now I can hear them whenever I want.

text.Woman's Voice: We're done then? Off to bed with you!
Is she gone? What are we going to do? The raids are getting closer and closer to Mainspring. How much longer can we hide like this?
